channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Car explosion near Red Fort in India's capital kills at least 8 people, police say
item.description: A car exploded near the 17th century Red Fort in New Delhi on Monday, killing at least eight people, injuring others and triggering a fire that damage...

item.title: Trump slams air traffic controllers who called out during the government shutdown
item.description: Trump said on social media that he wasn't happy with controllers who called out of work, and suggested a $10,000 bonus for those who didn't take any t...

item.title: The FDA will lift warnings on hormone therapy for menopause
item.description: Hormone therapy drugs have carried box warning labels for years. The Food and Drug Administration is removing them, saying the risks were overstated.

item.title: Supreme Court declines to revisit gay marriage decision
item.description: The challenge to the court's 2015 ruling came from Kim Davis, the former Kentucky clerk who refused to issue same-sex licenses after the court's Oberg...

item.title: 'Death by Lightning' unfolds like an 1880s 'West Wing'
item.description: Netflix's new four-part miniseries dives into the plot to assassinate President James Garfield. Death by Lightning is full of recognizable arrogance, ...

item.title: I Started BRRRR-ing in My Mid-40s, Now I’ll Retire a Decade Earlier

item.title: AI PowerPoint-killer Gamma hits $2.1B valuation, $100M ARR, founder says
item.description: Gamma is growing quickly, and profitably, its co-founder CEO Grant Lee says.

item.title: Kaltura acquires eSelf, founded by creator of Snap’s AI, in $27M deal
item.description: Kaltura acquires AI avatar startup eSelf to integrate generative AI into enterprise video and learning tools.

item.title: Arctic air hits much of the US, bringing snow to some areas and very chilly temperatures to Florida
A better way of thinking about the AI bubble
item.description: AI isn't all or nothing, and even good bets can turn sour if you aren't careful about how you make them.

item.title: Google brings Gemini to the Google TV Streamer
item.description: The tech giant says the change will enable users to use their voice more naturally to access content and more.

item.title: While Trump threatens controllers, US flight cancellations will drag on even after shutdown ends
Supreme Court rejects call to overturn its decision legalizing same-sex marriage nationwide
item.description: The Supreme Court has rejected a call to overturn its landmark decision that legalized same-sex marriage nationwide.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes faces shutdown in January without new funding
item.description: The company is "still fighting to find ways to continue" according to an email viewed by TechCrunch.
